author: Sarah Griffiths
comment: Absolutely sick of waiting for this to load and seeing 'Talking to Nationwide'. Usually end up logging in online which is just far more inconvenient. It really needs some work. Very frustrating! It's actually a brilliant app once you're on but very very unreliable.

author: Bruce Longshaw
comment: It's one of the few apps that doesn't do updates for pointless changes that just throw you. It's simple, and clear. The only suggestion: don't use 'Close' as a term, use 'Back' as the former makes you wonder if the whole app is going to close. A great app.

author: Callum Syme
comment: Use to love this but since being told by your customer support that I don't have access to see references for payments coming in, I have been very unhappy. I use this for my window cleaner customers to pay into and their address references do not show up. I was told only nationwide staff get to see these. Seems so out dated as all other banks provide this service.
Was reluctant due to security worries. But got it recommended by NW branch staff who helped with the set up. Made it sooo much easier to manage the accts, make pymts etc...Love it :-)

author: Eitak Nolnah
comment: Not working for Huawei Mate 10 Pro on Android Oreo 8.0.0 which isn't helpful get with the times and update the app.  Very frustrating!

author: Bracken Dawson
comment: Love it! Just switched from Barclays and while it doesn't look as nice asthetically it is way more functional. Can see details of pending transactions and can use finger print login. Good stuff!

author: Stephen Hoare
comment: When it works it's a great app. The problem is there are so many times when it is 'talking to Nationwide' without connecting rendering it useless. I would hate to have to rely on this app.

This app drives me nuts! I love Nationwide and have been a customer forever, but the amount of time this spends 'Talking to Nationwide' and then just never actually logging in means 85% of the time I am not able to use it. Please sort it out Nationwide!!

author: Nicola Redford
comment: Constantly freezes when trying to log in. Having to uninstall and reinstall to get it working. Never had this problem before the update, now bloody useless!

author: Karen Loomes
comment: When it works it's great but often it will just say talking to Nationwide.  This can be very frustrating.

author: Noel Rose
comment: Good app does what I says, it has have improved over the years still needs a bit more of improvements that allows the customer more access to their accounts to enable them to carry out more transactions on the go

author: A Google User
comment: I've improved my star rating because the features have improved and visually it's much better. Wish it had a One Time Code option to set up new payees rather than having to carry a card reader.
So unreliable... always 'talking to nationwide' have uninstall and reinstall to get it to work. Once it actually works its easy to use.

author: Derek Smith
comment: It would be brilliant if it actually worked. I have lost count of the times when I have watched the wosit whirring around and not connecting.
Not bad especially when compared to the dire quality of other banking apps. Messages on login are really annoying, I don't want ads.

author: Darren Bradnick
comment: Great app. Does everything you pretty much need. Fast and pretty reliable. Not sure what's happened to the fingerprint login though... Pixel 2 XL

reply.author: Nationwide Building Society
reply.content: Thanks for the 5 stars Darren. - Amy

author: Alison Roper
comment: This used to be a great app, I used it all the time . Can hardly access it now though as all I get is "talking to Nationwide " !! Sort it out or I'll be banking elsewhere.

author: Mark Edmondson
comment: What a pathetic app won't even open and its been like it for months. Started banking with Lloyds their app actually works you muppets!

author: Damian Strudley
comment: Works perfectly on Samsung s8+ thank you for making online banking so easy.. I have needed to make a money transfer at short notice when in middle of nowhere and working, thanks to this app no problem.. able to check balances and much more .. keep up the good work..

author: Amanda Marquis
comment: App is temperamental sometimes it works sometimes not, I have uninstalled and reinstalled and still the same message "Talking to Nationwide", I do not normally give reviews but I am so disappointed and frustrated with this app that I had to vent.

author: Liz Shuttleworth
comment: Very annoying app. You cannot just edit reference name related to a payment. You have to use laptop to change it. Every month i have change invoice number on ref. Ridiculous! Unnecessary and annoying.
Doesn't work won't let me set up properly for my flexaccount - worked before changed from Apple to android

author: srikaanth balaji
comment: This app has gone from bad to worse to downright unusable, it no longer shows my current account

author: Emma Van Blommestein
comment: Recently waiting an age for the app to open. If you can get in it's a fantastic app but of no use if you're forever waiting for the "talking to Nationwide" to finish...

author: Stephan Aal
comment: Excellent app.  Gives me access to all my main banking functions. Very sensibly , it restricts the addition of new payees to the desktop application which requires the use of a card reader and pin.
Good app, but once you set up reference for the payee you can't edit it. So if I need to edit every month different reference it's not possible.  Very limited

author: oh no no no mado sssokaro awa
comment: Slow loading. Fed up of uninstalling and reinstalling to fix the problem!!!!! Extremely frustrating when you urgently need to make payments!!! Very disappointing.

author: Colin Marshall
comment: App is great and updates always adding something. Lost stars as can't use on 2 phones and fingerprint login does not work on tablet,samsung tab s 10.5.

author: Honesty Integrity
comment: I have amended my review of this app has the last update seems to run a lot smoother. Zero issues to report other than a very good update.

reply.author: Nationwide Building Society
reply.content: Hi William, thanks for improving your rating! We'd love this to be a 5* app for you, are there any particular reasons why the App is just ok? We'll take any feedback on board to help improve the app for our members!Thanks - Jamie

author: Simon Cambridge
comment: I've been using this app for several months. Works fine on Samsung s3. Great for keeping track of money,making transfers and paying bills. Wouldn't be without it now.
Rarely loads and end up logging on the normal way. Very frustrating!

author: Stuart Cant
comment: Used to love the app but the past few weeks it isn't as fast as it once was and on occasions doesn't open when requested. Can you please fix this
I'm also sick of waiting for it to load and have to reinstall it often.

author: Steve P
comment: Just needs the ability to add new payees via a secure digital password rather than card reader (like First Direct do)

author: alan stewart
comment: Decent app, the quick balance option is good but the app is a bit basic and quite behind compared to the other banking apps that I have seen.

author: Henry Morgan
comment: Issues in previous version have been fixed :)

author: ella m
comment: Love the app. Since I installed it on my phone I don't need to go to the bank, I can do most transaction on it. Very happy and would recommend

author: Will Palmer
comment: Simple. Easy. Reliable. Obviously for complex stuff you go online proper, but more common stuff, this do the job.

author: Sarah Robinson
comment: Works perfectly on my LG, not had a problem with it since I installed it a few years ago.  Like the fingerprint log in, fast and secure.

author: Laura Ulyatt
comment: It used to be great, now all it says is talking to nationwide. Sort it out!
